DOC.brief_title: Therapeutic Response Ultrasound Muscular Stretching Temporomandibular Disorder Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim evaluate therapeutic response ultrasound ( US ) ultrasound associate stretch masticatory muscle pressure pain threshold electrical activity masseter anterior temporal muscle Temporomandibular Disorder ( TMD ) patient . The study include 18 woman TMD diagnose instrument Research Diagnostic Criteria Temporomandibular Disorders ( RDC / TMD ) . The pressure pain threshold , evaluate algometry , electrical activity masticatory muscle evaluate , mean surface electromyography , immediately therapeutic procedure . The volunteer undergo three different intervention : ultrasound , ultrasound associate stretch ultrasound placebo , 1-week minimum interval .
DOC.criteria: diagnosis myogenic mixed TMD accord Research Diagnostic Criteria Temporomandibular Disorders ( RDC / TMD ) woman age 20 35 year . psychomotor impairment ; history orthopedic trauma involve temporomandibular region , orofacial surgery poor training ; analgesic , antiinflammatories , muscle relaxant , antidepressant ; presence acute TMJ pain ( last 3 month ) ; perform physical therapy speech therapy past 6 month ; period end menstrual cycle ( 7 day prior menstruation ) onset menstruation ( first 2 day ) exclude conduct evaluation volunteer use oral contraception use break .
